amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds to issue or to implement the proposed rule on cost-sharing for animal and plant health emergency programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2096 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2096 proposed by Senator Bennett for Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S14007; text: CR S14007) To prohibit the use of funds to issue or to implement the proposed rule on cost-sharing for animal and plant health emergency programs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2096 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2096 proposed by Senator Bennett for Senator Levin.
